issues.description: In the template repository, ArrayHelpers defines a method named appendElement(T[] array, T element), but Stock.java invokes ArrayHelpers.addElementToArray and the solutionâ€™s ArrayHelpers also defines addElementToArray. This inconsistent naming causes compile errors and misleads students about the correct helper method to use.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the appendElement method in ArrayHelpers.java to addElementToArray (or vice versa update the call in Stock.java) so that the helper method name is consistent across the template and solution.
